text: <@UDU6KEBFB> It's pretty frustrating,. I don't know the real reason, but I look at it through the lens of GDPR. Once a contact is deleted, by any user in HubSpot, it would not be a good idea to put that contact back in via an integration if I look at it from HubSpot's perspective.
Because HubSpot wouldn't have the context of why that contact was deleted, there could be some liability invovlved since the ecommerce bridge API can be used to put in massive amounts of data
